name: Quest for the Homeland
description:
Quest for the Homeland  is  a text strategy\adventure game made on the Ink engine.

Participant of The 2020 Spring Thing Festival of Interactive Fiction.

You are in charge of a caravan with the last hundred survivors of your nation. Their fate depends on how much you know yourself.

  • Procedural generation: each journey leads you to different lands and events!
  • Short puzzle: 15 minutes playthrough
  • 4 different endings
  • Choices do have consequences!

Hope you enjoy it!
